alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 12:42PM CST until December 30 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Western Escambia County in south central Alabama... Western Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 130 PM CST. * At 1241 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Bay Minette to 11 miles east of Stapleton to near Summerdale to 8 miles west of Bon Secour, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Gulf Shores, Bay Minette, Atmore, Foley, Pace, Gulf Breeze, Brewton, Orange Beach, Goulding, Robertsdale, Century, Flomaton and Loxley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
